resources.string: Course in progress. Are you sure you want to restart the course?
Are you sure you want to restart the course?
Classroom has reached its limit of 4 students.
Student\'s name and the language he or she is learning
Click this button to go where the classroom is and where all students are. If you created a student for yourself you will find it here. Clicking it will get you to your personalized portfolio.
Click this button to go and create a student for yourself with a language you want to learn.
Click this button to use the dictionary for emergency cases.
This is your student account. Click the name to open your personalized portfolio.
This is the letter you have to pronounce.
Click this button to hear the correct pronouncing.
Click this button, pronounce the letter and click again to check it is correct.
This is the letter you have to write.
In this space you can write the letter.
After you have written the letter, click this button to validate.
If you are uncomfortable writing in your phone, click this button to open the camera and verify a real writing.
If you need to retry, click this button to cancel the drawing.
You have to find the meaning of this word.
Click the answer you think is correct.
You have to find the correct word to fill in the blank space
This is your learning journey. For every cloud you have to learn the lesson in order to move on to the other clouds and reach the finish line
Here you will find the dictionary. This is the search bar where you can find the word you need.
This is the word in italian.
Clicking this icon, you can listen the pronunciation.
Clicking the card, a translation in english and french will appear.
